perfcenter.simulator.metric

Class ConfInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • perfcenter.simulator.metric.ConfInterval

  • public class ConfInterval
extends java.lang.Object
    Given a set of data points, this class helps to calculate confidence intervals for that set.
